title: High Speed Internet Access, Cabana, Balcony, Eat-in Kitchen
map_address: 9100 W. Flamingo Rd. near Flamingo and El Capitan
posting_body: ['Your Modern Getaway in Spring Valley', 'Find your escape at FireSkye, a fully modernized apartment community now leasing upscale 1, 2 and 3 bedroom residences.', 'Nestled in Spring Valley within sight of Red Rock Canyon, we invite you to experience a higher level of luxury with all-new amenity upgrades and reimagined social spaces to make you feel at home.', 'Soak up the sun by the pool, chill out in a private cabana, and live every day like you’re on vacation.', 'When it’s time to head back to your apartment, you’ll be greeted by thoughtfully designed living that instantly feels like your own personal oasis.', 'RENOS - COMING SOON!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 36', 'OR Text', '36', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Follow The Link', 'Below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1080 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Balcony', '- Range', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Microwave', '- Ice Maker', '- Double Vanities', '- Air Conditioning', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Refrigerator', '- Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '- Storage Units', '- In Unit Washer & Dryer', '- Kitchen', '- Heating', '- Eat-in Kitchen', '- Wi-Fi', '- Fireplace', '- Tile Floors', 'Community Amenities', '- Business Center', '- Cabana', '- Pool', '- Property Manager on Site', '- Spa', '- Fitness Center', '- Lounge', '- Grill', '- Courtyard', '- 24 Hour Availability', 'Pet Policy', 'One-time pet fee: $350', 'Pet deposit fee min: $150', 'Pet monthly rent min: $35', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Office Hours', 'Monday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday: 11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'FireSkye', '9100 W. Flamingo Rd., Las Vegas, NV, 89147', '1WUYjUm4a']
